"Device Celebrating the Nation's Foundat:
"I may have been a bit careless in the final stages...
To forget the ignition device for the fireworks...
I might have been goofing off too much.
But let's not be discouraged! We will prepare it
immediately! This is a just a rumor I've heard,
but isn't there a self-destructing automata in the
Underworks of Lilipur? Let's launch the fireworks
into space this time using self-destruction timers!"

"わたしったら、詰めが甘かったな……
花火に必要な点火装置を忘れるなんて
ちょっと浮かれすぎだったかも。
でもメゲないよ！　今すぐ用意しよう！
噂で聞いたんだけど、リリーパの地下坑道に
自爆する機甲種がいるらしいじゃない？
その自爆タイマーを使って
今度こそ宇宙で花火を打ち上げようよ！"
